content: *bring warmth home with this striped sawtooth afghan crocheted in bernat blanket yarnspirations * materials blanket 300 g/10 5 oz 234 m/258 yds 2 balls main color mc dark grey 10044 2 balls contrast a pumpkin spice 10630 size u s n/15 10 mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge pattern 2-row repeat note do not break yarn at end of 2nd row carry yarn up side of work crochet side edging to finish
